discount: Up to 35% off with your Seylan Credit/Debit Card

offer_details_1:
1.  The offer will be valid only for all Seylan Bank Master and Visa Credit Cardholders.

  2.  In order to enjoy the promotion, the full payment needs to be settled with a Seylan Master or Visa Credit Cards.

  3.  Only 50% of the discounted room rate will be debited to the Cardholder/Card Member at the time of reservation and the balance should be settled at the hotel from the same card by the Cardholder/Card Member.

  4.  Reservations to be made in advance by way of making a call to the central reservations on 0773138844.

  5.  The offer will not be applicable for reservations made through online and other platforms.

  6.  Reservations will be confirmed subject to availability.

  7.  The Hotel may restrict certain services/facilities as per the health guidelines and protocols.

  8.  Discount will not be applicable on upgrades, extras and supplements.

  9.  The offer is not valid for corporate events / functions.

  10. The offer will be valid on local rates and will not apply on any special promotional rates.

  11. The offer cannot be combined with any other existing offers.
